name: Petal Tray
description: A slipcast ceramic petal tray glazed in soft pink and white, designed to add a delicate, sculptural touch to your table or vanity. The gently curved form is perfect for serving condiments, dipping sauces, olives, tea bags, or small bites, making it a charming addition to dinner parties, charcuterie boards, and everyday meals.
